title: What should we do about Account Botting?
body:
Ive just been spamming a bunch of beginner bots on my smurf and ive seen a lot of very suspicious activities coming from players.
Most Notably, players not buying items or responding at all.
Other things include them using summoner heal at random points and only near other players, at one point i typed "Heal" in all chat next to a bot and they  healed me. even though we were both roughly full health
Most of them die a whole bunch because they end up under towers or tanking 30 minions with no items.

I have a few screenshots, but i dont know if Name and Shame applies. Can i get a Red to answer?

replies.body:
Robots shall rule the world!

Name and shame is banned on the boards, so don't put screens up here with their names visible. Secondly, reds don't read these boards.

Try making a ticket, see what they say. Bots are bad for gameplay, especially in places like beginners bots, where new players could be badly influenced by it.
i play with sum names off for a few reasons, and this is one of those. Other than that i figured out that person was actually just really bad.
